name: Chrome
overview: This game is hidden in the game Switchblade 2 and is activated by typing "CHROME" on the title screen. An OCS Amiga is recommended! Has smaller graphics issues on real A500 with ECS Agnus. The standalone game including all 20 levels is also available on CU Amiga Disk 35 (June 1992 issue) along with Dux, the hidden game from Lotus 2.
